# Interactive component


<script src="https://d3js.org/d3.v6.js"></script>  <!-- link to D3 library -->


<div id= "plot"></div>

<script>
  var svg =d3.select("div#plot")
      .append("svg")
      .attr("width","400")
      .attr("height","400");
  svg.append("circle")
    .attr("cx"."100")
    .attr("cy","200")
    .attr("r","50")
    .attr("fill","red");
</script>
